body:
Assorted Momo Yaoyorozu headcanons

  • She speaks multiple languages besides Japanese, including English/French/Italian/Latin
  • she actually has really messy handwriting (her brain moves fast so she writes things down fast)
  • She has a secret adoration of reptiles
  • actually she generally likes all small animals that are unconventionally cute
  • she loves socks and collecting cute socks! Lacey socks, patterned socks, fuzzy socks, thick socks, long socks; she loves them all!
  • While she may like classical/orchestral music, Momo actually loves all music genres equally!
  • when she was very little (pre or just post- quirk discovery), Momo wanted to be a botanist !
  • she still has an extreme love for the science of biology

body:
Cursed lewd thought

Basically, pulling on Chisaki’s tie to help him fuck you from behind as he’s pretty much only got half-arms and needs a bit of stability in order to properly do the intercourse.

(Listen okay, imbalance in very common in sexual relationships that involve amputees/limb-lacking-people and I gotta write him accurately, motherfucker.)

summary: Theory: Aizawa is deliberately given the potential problem children
title: Theory: Aizawa is deliberately given the potential problem children
body:
The makeup of 1-A is…kind of insane if you think about it from an in-universe POV. Aizawa is saddled with dealing with the children of several pro-heroes, including the No. 2’s son*, Midoriya “The Absolute Madman” Izuku**, and Bakugo “Personality Powers Personified” Katsuki. This is on top of the rest of his students, who are ultimately all highly superpowered teenagers no matter how kind-hearted they are. No wonder Aizawa is always so tired.

Considering everything, wouldn’t it make more sense to split up the most high-powered children? Maybe, except Aizawa has the perfect combination of personality and quirk to keep these teens in line.

1. He has the lowest tolerance for bullshit on the UA staff. He’s clearly the first teacher to ever properly discipline Bakugo for his behavior towards Deku, which speaks volumes. Nothing is getting past him.

2. Related, Aizawa is not going to get starstruck or bullied by any pro hero wanting special treatment for their child. He does not care who your dad is, if you suck you suck and are getting expelled.

3. His quirk is unparalleled in its ability to halt superpowered teenage shenanigans in their place. See the Bakugo incident once more.

All in all, it makes total in-universe sense that Aizawa got all the problem children and why he is such an effective teacher. He’s in the best position to stop their bullshit before it starts.

* I get the impression that while Endeavor’s abuse is not known outside of the Todoroki family and Deku, he does seem to be a known asshole among the hero community.

** While One for All isn’t public knowledge, it’s pretty clear that Deku is All Might’s successor/favorite too, which also essentially puts him in the “child of pro hero” category as well.

summary: Hey!! I saw the ask box open. I want to write a shindeku little mermaid au, with shinsou as ariel and deku as eric. I need help...
question: Hey!! I saw the ask box open. I want to write a shindeku little mermaid au, with shinsou as ariel and deku as eric. I need help figuring out who the other characters would be, can you help? Thanks!!
answer:
This is super mega cute.

Ok first off please let Aizawa be King Tritan. That would be absolutely hilarious.

MIC WOULD BE SEBASTIAN.

I can’t really decide what villain would be Ursula. All for One? Tomura? Kurogiri?

Idk who Flounder would be. Normally I would say Deku but he’s Eric. Eri would be cute tho!

Kaminari probably as Scuttle.

Idk who Flounder would be. Normally I would say Deku but he’s Eric. Eri would be cute tho!

Kaminari probably as Scuttle.
